element.name: Cause of Injury
element.definition: The category of the reported/suspected external cause of the injury.
element.v3Comment:
Suggested code list is represented in ICD-10-CM. Reference the NEMSIS Suggested Lists at: https://nemsis.org/technical-resources/version-3/version-3-resources/
Code list is represented in ICD-10 Codes.
Website - http://uts.nlm.nih.gov
Product - UMLS Metathesaurus

asserts.assert: Cause of Injury should be recorded when Incident/Patient Disposition is "Patient..." and Possible Injury is "Yes".
Cause of Injury should only be recorded when Possible Injury is "Yes".
When Cause of Injury has a Not Value (Not Applicable, Not Recorded, or Not Reporting), it should be empty.

When Cause of Injury is empty, it should have a Not Value (Not Applicable, Not Recorded, or Not Reporting, if allowed for the element) or a Pertinent Negative (if allowed for the element), or it should be omitted (if the element is optional).
When Cause of Injury has a Not Value, no other value should be recorded.
